casebody.data:

v.
EVERETT CASH MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Everett Cash Mutual Insurance Group and Excel Insurance Services, Inc., Appellees-Defendants. Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-PL-262 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED January 8, 2019

Unpublished Memorandum Decision

Affirmed.
